title: Ranked - Skip a level if playing well?
body: So I'm on a 17 game win streak 83% win rate and smash my promos, but still only go from bronze 4 to bronze 3.  It's killing me how many games i need to play to get out of my B5 placement into silver+.  Why isn't there some reward for playing above your rank to help progress, increased LP per game or skip a fkn level here and there.

replies.body:
There is. If your MMR is high enough, you can skip a division or 2.

You know you have high MMR when you are getting over 30+ LP for wins and only losing like 10 or less for losses. That usually means you will skip a division after your next promos. 

You must have had REALLY bad MMR if you win 17 games in a row and only climb 2 divisions. Each division should be 6 wins, 0 losses (0-100 LP in 4 games and 2 promo wins) with good MMR.
Thanks Barry.  Not sure why my MMR was so bad, went 6W4L in placements with the help of 2 games with afkers but started winning from there basically.

It's usually slow to start. In my experience, the only ones who really get to skip divs are those whose mmr is at least a tier and a half above their rank. 

The only consistency I've seen in div skips is with new ranked teams with players who are Diamond~. The have the flat mmr for new ranked players in placements (mid Silver) and get placed S1 or G5 then skips divs 2 or 3 at a time up to Diamond basically.
